<<<<<<< HEAD
Troades Englished. By S.P. Troades. English Seneca, Lucius Annaeus, ca. 4 B.C.-65 A.D. Pordage, Samuel, 1633-1691?
[10], 67 [i.e. 70] p.
Printed by W.G. for Henry Marsh at the Princes Arms in Chancery-Lane, and Peter Dring at the Sun in the Poultrey neer the Counter, London : 1660.
S.P. = Samuel Pordage. In verse. With an additional title page, engraved: Troades. A tragedie writen in Latine by L Annæus Seneca, .. Numerous errors in pagination. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: Jan. 3.". Bound with Pordage's: Poems upon several occasions. By S.P. Gent. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[10], 67 [i.e. 70] p.
Printed by W.G. for Henry Marsh at the Princes Arms in Chancery-Lane, and Peter Dring at the Sun in the Poultrey neer the Counter, London : 1660.
S.P. = Samuel Pordage. In verse. With an additional title page, engraved: Troades. A tragedie writen in Latine by L Annæus Seneca, .. Numerous errors in pagination. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: Jan. 3.". Bound with Pordage's: Poems upon several occasions. By S.P. Gent. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

Peter Dring
